Articles.Content:
Hi there everyone. Recently I was challenged to send a fully functioning house to the North Pole with no parachutes. Feel free to suggest any challenges you'd like to see me do in KSP in the comments the more fun and wacky the better!

This is the first time I've made a video in this format/style. Id greatly appreciate any suggestions or constructive criticisms on how to improve my video. Also feel free to check out my other videos. I have a Ksp Pvp series currently in the go too.

Thanks.

~4040~
Awsome vid to watch, nice work! xD
